articles.description: Arc System Works has announced Guilty Gear: Strive Season Pass 2 downloadable content character Bedman?. He will launch on April 6 alongside the additional battle stage "Fairy's Forest Factory."

articles.author: Daniel Morris
articles.title: Hogwarts Legacy Outfit Allows Players to Become an Assassin's Creed Character - GameRant
articles.description: A Hogwarts Legacy player shows off their created outfit in the game that makes the player resemble an Assassin's Creed protagonist.
articles.content: A Hogwarts Legacy player has put together an outfit that resembles a character from the Assassin's Creed franchise. The huge focus on character customization in Hogwarts Legacyhas seen a huge influx … [+2883 chars]

articles.title: Top Tech News of the Week: March 11 - HYPEBEAST
articles.description: CASETiFY also tapped Daniel Arsham for a futuristic, automotive-inspired accessory capsule.
articles.content: This week, the tech industry learned about an exciting new development coming out of Meta. The company quietly shared that its working on a text-based app that sounds strikingly similar to Twitter, b… [+3848 chars]
